nodes.documentation: Mix string data into a RandNode. Returns a new RandNode.
nodes.name: derive

nodes.documentation: Mix signed int data into a RandNode. Returns a new RandNode.
nodes.name: derive

nodes.documentation: Mix unsigned int data into a RandNode. Returns a new RandNode.
nodes.name: derive

nodes.documentation:
Returns the base RNG hash for the given RandNode.
Does another round of hashing in case you made a RandNode("Stuff").
nodes.name: getHash

nodes.documentation: Return true or false with 50% probability.
nodes.name: getBool

nodes.documentation: Get an int128 full of random bits.
nodes.name: getInt128

nodes.documentation: Get a real88x40 between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
nodes.name: getReal

nodes.documentation: Get an integer between low, inclusive, and high, exclusive. Represented as a normal int, not a real.
nodes.name: getIntBetween

nodes.documentation:
Get a real between realLow (inclusive) and realHigh (exclusive).
Only actually has the bits of entropy from getReal, so some values will not occur.
nodes.name: getRealBetween

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct RNG.RandNode memory,int256) pure returns (struct RNG.RandNode memory)

nodes.documentation:
Roll a number of die of the given size, add/subtract a bonus, and return the result.
Max size is 100.
nodes.name: d
